QuestData.Title: They're Out There!
QuestData.Description: They're out there, $c. And they're on to us.$b$bSome of my men have begun turning up dead. Elf attacks, no question about it.$b$bMy guess is that your work at Astranaar has them desperate to stop our progress here. A last ditch effort to escape defeat!$b$bTake these goggles. They'll help you see even the sneakiest of the elves. Keep them off my back while we finish weaponizing your explosives.
QuestData.LogDescription: Jinx at The Skunkworks wants you to kill 12 Ashenvale Assassins.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice work, friend.$b$bYour skills have bought us the time we needed to prepare the bomb. It's almost complete!
